title.narrative: Contract to provide Technical Assistance for Tax Administration, Compliance & Taxpayer Services

description.narrative: This activity (Contract to provide Technical Assistance for Tax Administration, Compliance & Taxpayer Services) is a component of Tax Administration - Compliance and Taxpayer Services (TACTS) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £4,846,592. This component benefits Bangladesh, and works in the following sector(s): Public finance management (PFM), Domestic revenue mobilisation. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, Maxwell Stamp PLC, PwC, Surja Setu Samaj Kallyan Sangstha. The start date is 18-10-2010 and the end date is 31-12-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
